column5: ok so I got a new rod at the london Fishing show it is a sellus baitcast. So now I will have to find a reel for it. I'm open to sugestions and possible purchase of used reel. I curently have 2 baitcast reels on of each hand but when I use a spining set up I reel with my left. So I think I'm looking for a left hand reel  Let me know what you think I should use and why and pm me if you have something used

A shimano chronarch can't be beat. Quantum energy PT or a smoke PT are 2 great choices as well.  If u wanna look for a used reel, PM me, I have a few models all left hand I'm likely gonna be selling soon.
We have no idea what to recommend. Which rod is it and what are you fishing for? Which other baitcasters do you have?
with that rod in mind i wouldn't really want to break the bank on a very expensive reel, the Caenan from Shimano would fit the bill nicely.   *note* Sellus is a new 2012 line from Shimano
here is the specs on the rod  length  6'10" power  medium heavy action fast construction 24 ton  it is also labled spinnerbait
I too just bought a new rod and reel today! Quantum EXO PT spinning and a St. Croix Avid rod. COME ON APRIL 1st!!!!!!
get a used shimano or the new Caenan If I was you, I would be PM'ing uglyfish!
